Class Tag

java.lang.Object
Tag
public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents categories of FlashCards. FlashCards can have zero or more Tags, and users can use Tags to easily find related FlashCards.
See Also:
FlashCard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Tag​(java.lang.String aName)
    Constructs a Tag with a name, and does not apply the Tag to any FlashCards.
    Tag​(java.lang.String aName, FlashCard flashCard)
    Constructs a Tag with a name and adds the Tag to a single FlashCard.
    Tag​(java.lang.String aName, java.util.Set<FlashCard> aFlashCards)
    Constructs a Tag with a name and adds the Tag to the specified FlashCards.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Adds this Tag to a FlashCard.
    void delete()

    Removes this Tag from a FlashCard.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the tag was removed from the FlashCard. False otherwise.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Removes every FlashCard from the set, and removes the Tag from each FlashCard.
